about_the_game:
Winlu Fantasy Tileset - Desert Interior extends the Winlu fantasy tileset series with new textures and tiles to create suitable rooms for the matching desert exterior tileset. This pack offers you a large selection of tiles for interiors in Egyptian, Arabian style and more.

Stylish palaces decorated with golden emblems and vases are also easy to create, this tileset gives your rulers power and luxury. From the overflowing buffet of various fruits, royal beds, baths, libraries to the simple house of a resident, the Desert Interior offers you a wide choice.

Many tiles can also be used for a medieval setting (e.g. nobility, rich)

Contents:

* 13 character sheets
* 9 tile sheets

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
